1111121.content:
"Huh?" She asks you confused.

"Why's that?" You ask her.

"In our language it means something like stranger." She tells her.

"I can't believe that. You certainly don't look weird. I mean you look like any Orc girl."

She shakes her head. "No, I'm not. Other Orc women stay in village, cook food, clean house. I don't want to do things like that."

"You are right about that. I wouldn't like to do those things either." You tell her and you both laugh. Shamba suddenly stops laughing and signals you stop too. She suddenly looks very serious. And she is right too, not far from you, you can see a deer drinking from a pond.

"How did you?" You begin to ask her but she beckons you to keep quiet. She points at you and your bow. Orcs prefer to kill with their war axe, they don't use bows often. They're too strong to use them.

You aim at the deer and with a precision shot you hit the deer right in it's side. The deer falls on the ground and can't move. Shamba runs up to the deer and gives it the killing blow. You always despised doing that.

Shamba immediately begins to cut up the deer, putting away the pieces that are edible.

She gives you half of it, and the other half she puts in a sack she keeps with her.

She is unsure what to do as she stands there sulking a bit. "I guess we better keep on going?" You suggest.

11111211.content:
All of a sudden Shamba comes running towardsyou and pushes you into the pond. You manage to get a deep breath of air before you end up into the cold water. While you're thinking what just happened, a huge thing dives into the water. To your surprise you can see it's Shamba. You want to swim up again, but Shamba grabs your arm and shakes her head. You try to pull lose, but Shamba keeps holding you tight. When you're almost out of breath, Shamba nods and you both go up again.

She places her large hand on your mouth. "Shh, we're not out of danger yet."

"How can that be? I didn't hear them." You say skeptic.

"Look for yourself." She points at a spot. You swim to the shore and get out of the water. You're completely wet, the water drops are falling out of your hair as you examine the spot Shamba pointed you at. With your hunter's eye you can see that they indeed belong to Orcs. Although how they manage to fool you is a complete mystery.

Shamba comes out of the water, her clothes are wet too. You can see her breasts throughout her top. Big, juicy breasts. Just the way you like them. You quickly return your gaze to Shamba's face.

You laugh at the thought of that, and Shamba begins to laugh too, a loud deep laugh. It surprises you but nonetheless you don't mind.

"Guess we can let the sun dry us up." Shamba suggests.

You think so too, but realize that other hunters might come by this spot later. You can risk it, or go to your secret cave.

choices: The mayor needs you to calm down Arion

1112.content:
You were always infamous as the man who consorts with beasts.

Since you were a child, you studied and befriended the afancs and jackalopes that wandering the forests around your home village, much to your family’s dismay. Monsters are dangerous and unpredictable, after all, and monster tamers weren’t believed to be very long for this world. Still, it was all you were really passionate about, so it was inevitable that you’d end up a certified beastmaster, renowned across the land for your deep understanding of magical creatures of all kinds.

A certain category of monster interests you above all others. The few that have integrated into human society; creatures who have the intelligence of humans and the ability of speech, even though postmortem analysis reveals both to be physically impossible. While these monsters are often treated fairer than others by the king’s decrees, they are also possibly even more distrusted, believed to be puppets controlled by human wizards. Thus, in the city of Rothorham, where you now lived, you were one of the only ones to have befriended the few intelligent beasts that walk the streets.

Cynthia, the griffon, seems most interested in becoming part of human society. She even has a job; delivering important letters all around Rothorham. Being a monster, most people are loathe to trust her with their mail, but the fact that she can fly from one end of the city to the other in minutes means they’re practically forced to come to her for urgent deliveries. More famously, the lord mayor of Rothorham’s prized possession is Arion, a mythical mare bred by the gods themselves, known for centuries for carrying soldiers into battle at impossible speeds. She spends most of her time in the stables of the lord’s palace, and you’re only called upon to calm her down whenever she becomes disobedient. Being immortal, the poor mare has a lot of emotional issues. Most mysteriously, there’s occasionally reports of a small wyvern wandering around the sewers. A wyvern could be a serious problem, if it becomes aggressive, but at the moment it just seems to be afraid of humans.

Every day, you have to deal with a new problem. As you sit in your hut on the edge of town, looking through your notes, you can only wonder at what the day will bring...
1112.title: Beastmaster

111322111.content:
"Hey, Xavier! How has life been treating you?" A strong feminine voice called out to you.

You turn around on the barrel that you were sitting on and you see the woman that you met the other day. She wasn't like the other women you've met. She stood at 6'3" and had an athletic body. Her eyes were an emerald green color and her hair was a snowy white blonde. She wore light armor and had a sword strapped to her waist. If memory serves you correctly her name was Kris. You didn't bother asking what her name was short for, but it was an edgy name for such a pristine woman.

"I'm doing fine. How about...," You couldn't finish your sentence. You were infatuated with Kris's beauty. You then trying looking towards the ground. However, this gives Kris the wrong impression. She then slaps you across the face.

"Pervert! You were totally checking out my boobs!"

"I wasn't looking at your boobs. It's just...," You are yet again at a loss for words. You can't put your finger on it, but Kris is starting to look familiar. You can't put your finger on it. Your face turns red as you can't muster any words.

"Well, what is it? Why can't you look me in the eye?" Kris said as she impatiently tapped her foot against the wooden floor of the tavern.

"I think I'm in love with you!," You blurt out. You then put your palm on your face. Did you really say that out loud. If that's the case then this may be a good night or a totally awkward and embarrassing night. Kris smiles mischievously, however you don't catch the smile since you weren't sure of why you told a woman you barely knew that you loved her.

"Is that all?", Kris begins laughing. "So that's why you have been acting weird. I thought you were some run of the mill pervert."

You take a deep breath as the red on your face disappears. You weren't sure if Kris was being coy or if she felt the same way towards you.

"You are good looking, but the question is do I reciprocate your feelings? I may need to take a rain check on that one. My father has been trying to set me up with suitors all day."

You then try thinking of any female knights or nobles that fit Kris's statement in regards to suitors. There are a few, including the princess, but most of them practice magic and you know nothing of the princess except that she doesn't spend her days inside the castle all day.

"So you're a noblewoman. Are you friends with the princess?"

Kris begins blushing. She then takes a breath before replying. "Let's just say that I know the princess very well," Kris replied while looking at the door. It's obvious that she's dodging the question. "What do you know it's time that I retired for the night. I hope to see you later Xavier."

Kris kisses you on the cheek and makes for the door. You arch an eyebrow at her suspicious behavior. You're sure that she doesn't want to say which one of the princess's friends she could be, yet at the same time she's so mysterious and alluring. You then look out the window as Kris takes off on horseback.
111322111.title: A Woman of Mystery

1113221111.content:
The next day you were summoned to the castle. You figured that the king needed you for a mission. You promptly head towards the castle. Once you arrive a butler escorts you to the the throne room. Once you arrive you see King Reuben and Kris?!

It takes you a while to recognize her, but now that you put your finger on it the only difference was the fact that she was wearing a dress. You quickly bow before the king and princess. Out of the corner of your eye Kris appears to be blushing, which in turn causes you to blush briefly.

"Rise Lord Ironback. We have much to discuss. I'm sure you already know my daughter, Princess Kristine."

After rising you r eyes go around the room before making their way back to the thrones, where the king and princess sat.

"Apologies milady. I was just telling your father how we met."

Kristine sighs as she twirls her snowy blonde hair.

"Please forgive Kristine's outburst. She tends to get sensitive when people talk about her to her face."

Kris then sighs and rolls her eyes. It is apparent that she would rather do something else right now.

"There's nothing yet, but what would you say if you took my sweet Kristine out for a day of fun at the fair."

The very thought of taking Kris to the fair aroused you. Tou were about to speak, but you couldn't muster any words. You then begin blushing profusely.

"Father! Would you quit trying to wed me off to every possible suitor! Let me choose my own future king for once damnit!" Kris yelled.

It was obvious that she was trying to repress her feelings towards you, but King Reuben saw through her denial.

"You're a terrible liar, Kristine. I'm not even trying to force you this time."

Kris then mumbles something under her breath and storms off.

"Please forgive Kristine again. She tends to have quite the temper."

"No offence taken. Last night she slapped me across the face because she thought I was being a pervert."

King Reuben arches an eyebrow. You then regret saying that. But to your surprise he starts laughing.

"That's my daughter for you. You may want to catch her before she goes horseback riding. She usually doesn't return home till nightfall."

If you want to be tough and strong, Why don't you try an Orc.

Dwarves may be sercetive, but alway having extra equipment is useful.

They are so many choice for half breeds, half-elf, Half Orc, Mul (half dwarf), Banes (Orc and elf), Bearded elves (elves and Orc) Etc..

For your information, Furries or Anthros, if you prefer, such as Dragonmen, Khajit (cat-like) Vul (wolf-like) and etcs are acceptable member races of Role playing games, such as Dugeon and Dragon, The Eldar Scrolls, etc, some don't complain to me about that. That said, try to keep it with Rpg rules. Specifly don't have some eighty different anthro species as your NPCs, (there should be more than 10).Each of the species should have a backstory.

They shouldn't be lump up in one group. For example, The cat-like anthro could enjoy be in the companies of Dwarves, but dislike being about Dragonmen.
12.title: Another Race (Orc, Elf, Etc.)

121.content:
As has been mentioned, there are many kinds of Elves (Dark Elf, Wood Elf, High Elf, etc.) A common trait among elves is that their ears are highly sensitive and touching ears is something an elf would only do with someone he or she feels very close with, it's sort of like 3rd base for them.

How about some characters to start with, who's the hero or heroine in this story?

1. Hundre the Pure
Hundre is a male High-Elf Paladin. He wears light chainmail armor, is skilled in a variety of fighting styles, goes on adventures fighting evil, and has short blonde hair and a muscular frame. He's pledged a vow of chastity to his paladin order, so he's not supposed to be having sex with any of the maidens he saves. Will some temptress cause him to break his vow of chastity and fall from grace, or will love still bloom in a chaste relationship?

2. Princess Luca
Princess Luca is a Dark Elf. Dark Elves come in a variety of skin tones, anywhere between a light brown color, to ashen gray. They're often amoral and ruthless. Princess Luca lives in a small coastal city-state where her father is king. However, Luca is an extraneous princess; her older sister Sonia will be gaining the crown, so her father wants her to marry someone from a noble family to help his royal house gain prestige. But does Luca's heart belong to someone else already?
121.title: Elf (pointy ear rule!)

choices: Luca decides to give Chadzor a chance
Luca is already in love with her own sister, Sonia (Oh, how scandalous!)
1212.content:
Princess Luca, the Dark Elf, was in her royal villa munching on some grapes. She was a little bit short for an elf, had smooth dark tan skin, and short pitch black hair. Her ears were rather long, and she was quite proud of them. Her clothing was mostly ornamental, considering she lived in a hot climate, and didn't leave much to the imagination, just a white silk loincloth and a white silk piece of cloth tied around her breasts. She had on numerous gold bracelets, anklets, a jeweled pendant, and a cute little silver tiara. A cool breeze went over her skin.
"Oh, this is the life..." Luca thought in her head as she popped a grape in her mouth.
Then, out of nowhere, she heard a knock on her door. She nearly choked on her grapes!
"You may enter!" Luca called out.
The door opened and in walked a burly handsome elf man. He was tall, muscular, and wore nice silken robes. Behind him walked her father, The King.
"F... Father! What are you doing here unannounced?" Luca said.
The King laughed.
"Well, it's my palace, I can go wherever I please, can't I?" He said.
Luca discreetly rolled her eyes. She hated it when he came in without warning her. She might have put on some nicer clothes instead of lounging in her underwear.
"Anyway, Luca, you need to get married and start making me some grandchildren. I found you a nice partner, Chadzor, Prince of House Pent." The King said.
The burly elf man bent down and kissed Luca's hand.
"Pleasure to meet you, Miss!" He said, smiling.
Luca sighed. Every damn man she met greeted her this way, and all of them thought she would giggle like a schoolgirl when they did. She was a little bit tired of it.
"I don't know, Dad. I thought my sister Sonia would be getting arranged marriages. She's going to be queen, not me." Luca said.
"Oh, you didn't really think you'd get off that easy?" The King said.
He looked to Chadzor for a second.
"No offense to Chadzor, but I want to be friends with House Pent, and the quickest way to do that is to get my second best girl in with their second best boy. That's why I want you to love him. Now." The King said.
Luca looked over Chadzor. He was tall and handsome.
"My Lady, I'd be honored if you..." Chadzor started to say.
"Can't you just talk to me like a normal girl? Everybody does the 'Milady' junk and I'm sick of it." Luca said.
The King slapped himself in the face.
"See, this is why you aren't married yet, Luca." He said.
"No, no, it's okay. I can work with that." Chadzor said, grinning.
Luca looked over Chadzor again.
"I don't know if you're my type..." Luca said.
Chadzor laughed and threw off his robes. Underneath he wore nothing but a small red sack tied around his genitals, barely obscuring them.
"How about now?" He said.
Luca sighed. This guy was a real dumbass, but at least he appeared to have a sense of humor.
"Please... please put your clothes back on. You're making an ass of both of us." Luca said.
"You like my ass?" Chadzor said, turning around so Luca could see his bare ass.
"Stop it! That's gross! that's the end you poop from!" Luca said.
This might have been titillating if she was familiar with Chadzor but it just came off as rude.

Chadzor quickly figured out this was not going well. He quickly put his robe back on and turned to The King.
"You said it would work!" Chadzor said.
The King only frowned at him ,as if Chadzor had misstepped .
Prince Chadzor turned back to Luca.
"Listen, the striptease was your dad's idea. I'm not really a dumb hussy-man, honest!" He said.
Luca knerw this was probably true. She thought it over for a moment.
1212.title: Princess Luca

12122.content: After having thought it over Luca had realized she was already in love with her own sister Sonia and had to decide how to tell her as well as their father that or she could just tell Sonia and not their father
12122.title: Luca is already in love with her own sister, So...

122.content:
Are you a male or a female, it kind of important. For example, a female orc is more likely to have an other race relationship than male, (Yes I was surprised about that as well.)

Or you can skip ahead and just be a half-breed.
122.title: Orc (I fight for the horde!)

125.content:
Hmm, rather than leaping straight to furry, why don't we cover some other bases first?

Would you like to be some kind of spiritual creature, like a demon, angel or djinn? Or perhaps something else entirely?
125.title: Furry (RPG version)

choices: Offer to skate with the ogress when she returns
Stare at the frozen lake dreamily
1253.content:
You extend your arms and fondle your bovine ears of the cow kind. Then you walk though some briar patches with your humanly sensitive skin and human legs: You want to go roller skating. You figured out what your bringers who caged you in this place meant by skates from how they looked and their legs when taking them out to their methods of conveyance so untouchable by you - looked looked at them like special boots - and they while talking as they get ready to Gia, they looked at the lake like the shoes with wheels - that the same thing that was done by them could be done by a slightly different special boot out there on the lake - the lake that y'all shared. You find your way through the briar patches and came to the lake that was the special place of interaction. What kind of skates would work here? Why had your givers not gotten and used special shoes for this lake?

You see an ogre already there. "Good evening cowling," it said. It was clutching some feathers with which it used to trade elite items. She looked unsure what to do with the feathers.

"Have you thought of special boots for the ice upon the lake" you asked.

The ogress looked enchanted. "You'll get to see something, cowling."

You the cowling were glad y'all shared similar vocal structures and had similar lifespans. It was ideal for dating. You cocked her head flirtly at the woman. The ogre looked curiously at you.
1253.title: Other

13.content: Out of the following choices, what kind of Mythical creature are you?
13.title: Mythical Creature

131.content: So you are a dragon. Dragons are mighty creatures and are usually feared. Over the centuries your kind has learned to disguise yourselves as humans. Are you a male dragon or female dragon? Or are you one of rare galf dragons?
131.title: Dragon

info.brief_description: Play as an certain race or mythical creature and fall in love with somebody!
info.description:
In this interactive, you can be all kinds of fantasy creatures and ''races''. From Elves to Orcs, from Dragons to Werewolves, you name it. There are no exceptions to what you can be, just keep it in the ''fantasy'' theme, don't bring characters from video games in, like Mario.

You can have sex, and fetishes are included, however, it is not neccesarry, it is just falling in love.
Literally everything can happen, and everything is allowed. Just try to keep the character alive, that is my only rule.

However, do try to have it make a little bit of sense, I know I said that everything can happen, but don't make it like, ''and then, the town was attacked by a huge unicorn, and then Billy Mays came by to sell kaboom, you buy it and defeat the giant unicorn with it and everyone was happy theend.'' You know what I mean.

Well, that is all, have fun writing, and don't be scared to PM me for permission for something.
